name: Applivery
description:
Native SDK to support Applivery platform. Main features of the SDK are: 
* Automatic updates. Everytime you upload a build to Applivery, your beta testers will be notified
* Force update. You can limit the usage of your up to a minimun app version
* Provide feedback. Your beta testers can upload a screenshot or simply a message, to report bugs or improvements
